page.title: 04Streams of Chelmsley Wood
page.content: We went to{Hatchford Brook}.It stank. The water was quite clear and running fast. We saw patches of oil. There were rushes,irises and lots of water weeds. There were also sticklebacks,leeches,water snails,catfish and stone loaches.{Low {Brook}flows into{Hatchford Brook}and was clearer. We found two frogs. We saw trolleys,keys,tyres,a wheel chair,a lawn mower,an umbrella,glass bottles and cans. We followed{ {Hatchford Brook}to{Meriden Lake}and on to the{River Cole.}By{Meriden Lake}we saw rushes,irises,willows and alder trees. There were some mallards,a coot,white ducks,two swans with four cygnets and some doves. The water was dark and smelly. The{River Cole}was wider,deeper and much faster. We didn't see any fish there, only weed.
